Package ca.group8.gameservice.splendorgame.controller.splendorlogic

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
ca.group8.gameservice.splendorgame.controller.splendorlogic.GameManager
@Component public class GameManager extends Object
Manages instances of Splendor games.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(long gameId) throws IOException
      Save gameInfo, playerStates and actionInterpreter of such gameId into the json file. path: server/saved_games_data.json
      Parameters:
      gameId - game id of which game we want to save.
      Throws:
      IOException
